text: Nogometni klub Olimpija Ljubljana is a Slovenian football club from Ljubljana which plays in the Slovenian PrvaLiga. They have won three Slovenian PrvaLiga titles and four Slovenian Cups. It was founded on 2 March 2005 as NK Be≈æigrad. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2005 establishments in Europe Category:Establishments in Slovenia Category:European football clubs Category:Football in Slovenia Category:Sports organizations of Slovenia Category:Ljubljana
title: NK Olimpija Ljubljana
